### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE credit_and_loan_management (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    credit_score INT,
    loan_eligibility BOOLEAN
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE credit_and_loan_management SET credit_score = 750 WHERE customer_id = 101;
